text: William Joseph Bauer (born September 15, 1926) is an American judge. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He is the Senior Judge on the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit since October 31, 1994. He served as Chief Judge of the court from 1986 through 1993. He was nominated to serve by President Gerald Ford. ==References== ==Other websites== * DCBA Brief Online Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:American judges Category:DePaul University alumni Category:Politicians from Chicago
title: William Joseph Bauer
